name: First-Person Maze
description:
Collect the coins to win the level, but watch out for the holes in the floor, the flying obstacles, and the sweeper bars.  Finish all the levels and you win the game!

Use the arrow keys to run through the maze.  Use space bar to jump.  Hold down Shift to run. 

Designer Credit: Ryan & Torrance

*** This is a prototype version of the first 4 levels of our game.  Stay tuned for the complete, 6 level game, coming soon! ***
